gw.api.webservice.bc.messagingTools

Class BCMessagingToolsImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.webservice.messagingTools.MessagingToolsImpl
      • gw.api.webservice.bc.messagingTools.BCMessagingToolsImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MessagingToolsBase

    public class BCMessagingToolsImpl
extends MessagingToolsImpl
    Set of tools to get messaging statistics and perform operations on messages.

    This implementation doesn't override MessagingToolsImpl.getMessageStatisticsForSafeOrderedObject(int, String) to allow the super class to do its work. It assumes that each messaging destination has defined a primary object in the messaging-config.xml.

      • resyncAccount

        public void resyncAccount(int destId,
                 java.lang.String accountPublicId)
                   throws BadIdentifierException,
                          BatchProcessException
        Resync an Account against a specified destination
        Parameters:
        destId - The destination against which the Account should be resynced.
        accountPublicId - The publicID of the Account that should be resynced.
        Throws:
        BadIdentifierException - if the Account cannot be found
        BatchProcessException - if the batch server is not available or times out
